articles.title: Former India cricketers blast Arshdeep Singh for repeated no-ball offences - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Arshdeep Singh bowled a no ball in the final over of the New Zealand innings, that was followed by three successive sixes and a four. | Cricket
articles.content: Team India endured a 21-run loss in the first ODI of the three-match series against New Zealand on Friday. After New Zealand put a strong score of 176/6 in 20 overs, India endured a top-order collaps… [+2204 chars]
